name: NovelsNao Dark Transparent theme
description: A quick restyling for NovelsNao. Novelsnao's design has been tweaked again. I've temporarily replaced everything with an ugly fix. I intend to make a real update by March 9th, 2016 11PM CST. If there are problems with the style please send emails to my email.
additional_info:
Most Recent update: January 22, 2016 Update Notes: February 6, 2016
  • Changed background image host
  • Tweaked the main navigation background.
  • Added options to the style
January 22, 2016
  • CSS reorganized for better readability.
  • CSS was tweaked to fix things that were missed
